# Introduction

## Training Objectives

i.  Familiarization with R-Ecosystem

ii. Learn & focus the typical processes involved in Extract, Transform & Loading (ETL) with R programming

iii. Able to apply new knowledge in actual ETL project

<br>

> ***Welcome to R Programming Ecosystem!!*** ![](images/R_logo.svg.png){width="98"}

## Topics Covered

i.  Introduction to R

    -   What can we do with R?

    -   R-Studio IDE

    -   Coding style guide

    -   Data type

<br>

ii. Import & Export Data

    -   Excel, CSV

    -   Database

<br>

iii. Data Manipulation

     -   Introduction to [dplyr](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/) package
     -   Data manipulation with dplyr
     -   Data aggregation (count, grouping, summarize, slice, etc.)
     -   Data reshaping
     -   Handling date

<br>

iv. Regular Expression (Regex)

    -   Introduction to [stringr](https://stringr.tidyverse.org/articles/regular-expressions.html) package
    -   Regex operation with stringr

<br>

v.  Documents Extraction

    -   PDF & Excel

    -   Meta data

    -   Attachment from \*.msg
